body: My understanding is that 'native' simply refers to any function whose binding code is implemented in ATen, as opposed to the legacy TH. This is why @zdevito has been so adamant about not exposing native to the public interface (we now have the abstract/concrete distinction for that). Does "native" have a meaning beyond "concrete"? If not, then perhaps what you are asking for is a rename. (I do think 'native' gives the wrong intuition).
